name: Expos2
overview:
Expos2 is a world leader in the virtual event software industry. The company produces tools for the events, publishing, and expositions industries. Their focus is on bringing the inherent interactive strengths of the web to customers of all sizes.

The most recent Expos2 platform, v3, was released in the winter of 2011 and provides customers with a highly customizable, feature-rich solution that is competitive in terms of product cost and functionality. This platform is capable of hosting virtual trade shows, jobs fairs, conferences, and many more important B2B activities. Customers can host thousands of attendees, exhibitor booths, numerous speakers, and generate effective leads using the Expos2 v3 platform. Hosting or cloud hosting software options are available to any customer.
